committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Consumer Credit and Insurance

official_title: To amend the Fair Credit Reporting Act to prohibit the inclusion of certain information in files and credit reports relating to consumers.

summary.text: Amends the Fair Credit Reporting Act to prohibit a consumer reporting agency from maintaining in the file of, or furnishing in a report on, a consumer any information regarding a failure to make a payment on an account primarily because of the consumer's lack of access to funds in financial institutions in a State due to a bank holiday.

titles.title: To amend the Fair Credit Reporting Act to prohibit the inclusion of certain information in files and credit reports relating to consumers.
